content: step-by-step instructions on how to make a fun jellyfish toy for cats this video does contain all of the pattern steps but if you want them in written form with photos you can support the cauldron by purchasing a copy from our etsy shop note about the waistcoat stitch i use it to make a very dense fabric but i also have a very loose gauge this pattern will turn out very similarly if you single_crochet instead of waistcoat especially because i find waistcoat to be quite hard on the wrists after a while please take care of your hands materials used peaches & creme seabreeze peaches & creme mint size f crochet hook plastic safety eyes 12 wood dowel scissors
